title: Having builder enabled on the validator client while the beacon node's builder is disabled results in a panic

labels.name: Builder
labels.description: PR or issue that supports builder related work

body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description Having builder enabled on the validator client while the beacon node's builder is disabled results in a panic ### Has this worked before in a previous version? No ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction adding the `--enable-builder` flag or adding enable to the builder settings via the `--proposer-settings` flag on the validator client while removing the `--http-mev-relay` flag on the beacon chain will result in a gRPC panic. ## üî• Error

time="2023-04-13 17:25:23" level=error msg="gRPC panicked!" error="runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" stack="goroutine 387390391 [running]:
